text.emotional: [anger, medium]The one where he only sold sugar beet and nothing else. Or tried to. I’ll tell you another time, why that didn’t work out. Not that I need to explain why…[/anger]
text.silence: {.} the one where he {.} only sold sugar beet {...} and nothing else {...} or tried to {....} i'll tell you another time why that didn't work out {....} not that i need to explain why {...}
